name: Conveyor Jump
description:
Intro

 Welcome to  Conveyor Jump try fixing the conveyor belt and avoid the boxes.

Controls

Spacebar to jump over the crates

Tips and Tricks

  • You don't lose unless you go off the screen.
  • Try jumping a bit before you get close to the boxes.

Outro

also if you have any suggestions put them in the comments.

Have Fun :)
